lirik:
1.Jahowa sihol pujionku, ai Ham do Naibata sitompa au.
Sai suruh Tonduy-Mu hu bangku, mangajar au mamuji goran-Mu.
Marhiteihitei Jesus AnakMu, ase dear dodingku hu Bamu.

2.Bai Anak-Mu bobahon ahu ase Bamu iboban au homa.
Sorapkon Tonduy-Mu hubangku, manogu au bai dalan na torsa.
Ase tongtong gok damei uhurhin, janah mesek mamuji Goran-Mu.

3.Sai holong atei-Mu Jahowa, papandei au mamuji Goran-Mu.
Sai ulang asal puas hata, ningon botul mamuji hu Bamu.
Ham Bapa, Anak pakon Tonduy-Mu, doskon najongjong au i lobei-Mu.

4.Tonggokku na lang tarpajojor, Tonduy Napansing patalarhon in
Au gabe anak-Mu goranon, Tonduy homa do mangkatahon in.
Ase ibagas Kristus Anak-Mu boi au mardilo Bapa hu Bamu.

5.Ai Tonduy-Mu do mangajarhon martonggo au domu bai rosuh-Mu
Sirsir do tong Ham manangihon tonggokku marhiteihon Anak-Mu
Ibagas Jesus jaloonku do, mardapot-dapot pasu-pasu-Mu.

6.Sonin ma au marolob-olob, marhamegahon malas uhurhin.
Ai ra do Ham mamparuhurhon, na husuhutkon hu Bamu ijin.
Pasu-pasu-Mu sai sirnip do in, lobih humbani panagamankin.

7.Ibagas Kristus au manean, ai pitah Ia hasiholankin.
Marhitei Jesus sai saud ma Amen, na hupindohon rapkon Tonduy in.
Hupuji Ham ronsi sadokahniin, ai Ham tumang do hamegahonkin.

1.Puji Jahowa ale tonduyhu, puji ma Ia Naibata min
Paima bois ope bohalhu, sai pujionku layak-Ni in
Sitompa daging tonduy pe, ningon ipuji do hape
Haleluya! Haleluya!

2.Ge pe sangap partubuh ni jolma, ningon do mulak hu tanoh in.
Hauhuron ni ningon marpunsa. anggo ibondut tanoman in.
Seng jolma hasonangankin. Naibata hatundalankin.
Haleluya! Haleluya!

3.Martuah halak na niondingan ni Naibatanta Jahowa in.
Na tong toguh marhaporsayaon,bai Jesus Kristus Tuhanta in.
Ai Naibata hasomanmin, seng anjai hurang tuahmin.
Haleluya! Haleluya!

1.Sai Puji Naibata ai holong tong atei-Ni
Malayak tong homa bai ganup tinompa-Ni.
Megah ma hita on, mamuji Naibata.
Ai sasap dousa on, ibahen Naibata

2.Tuhanta Naibata marsuruh Jesus Kristus.
Jadi harga tumang do hita on itobus.
Iporsan Jesus in dousanta in ganup
Ase daroh-Ni in papansing haganup.

3.Halani ai talup na bere ma uhurta
Bai Naibata unduk ampa Jesus Tuhanta
Sonai ‘ge Tonduy in na roh hubanta on
Gantih ni Jesus in, pujion do tongtong.

1.Puji Jahowa na sangap anjaha mardohar
Hita ganup na ringgas na megah maruhur
Martumpu rup, marolob-olob ganup, haganupan manisia

2.Puji Jahowa Naibata sigomgom ganupan.
Na mambobai ho songon tinogu ni tangan.
Hosahmu pe sai iparorot hape, songon pinindomu Bani.

3.Puji Jahowa na sirsir manompa dagingmu.
Janah tongtong do manumpak jorgit pamatangmu.
Gati tumang roh partolongNi hubam sanggah roh ni hasosakan.

4.Puji Jahowa situmpak haganup horjamu.
Ai itumpakhon hubam tongtong hagoluhanmu.
Ingat ma ai, hinalayakni do ai, holong atei-Ni tumang do.

5.Puji Jahowa tonduyhu pasangap Goran-Ni.
Pakon ganup na marhosah mamuji hu Bani.
Ai do talup, baenon ni hita ganup, dodingkon hita ma Amen.

1.Hupuji holong ni atei-Mu, o Tuhan Jesus Rajangkin
Bamu huondoskon tonduyhu, ai do napinindo Mu in
Huhalupahon ma diringku mamingkir holong ni atei-Mu.

2.Sai ipindahi Ham do ahu, Ham pe huhasiholi do.
Itogu uhurMu uhurhu halani ai hubere do.
lpilih Ham hinan tonduyhu, ai pe hupilih Ham Tuhanku.

3.Huahap maningon mar-Tuhan, ningon manggoluh au Bamu.
Seng jumpah au be hagoluhan, anggo seng pinasirsirMu.
Sai Ham na baen parsarananku, sai gok Bamu mando langkahku.

4.Bamu sadokah ni dokahni, au on o Jesus Tuhankin,
Ham ma lah haganup ompungni, gogohku pakon artangkin,
Ai iberehon Ham darohMu, manggalar utang ni dousangku.

5.Ai domma au iparjabolon, sibolis pakon dousangkin.
Diatei ma Ham roh o Tuhan, manaron uhum bangku in-,
Itaron Ham do hamateian, mambahen bangku hagoluhan.

6.O Jesus, GoranMu uhirhon, bagas, torang bai uhurhon-,
Ase tarsurat ilobeihu holongni ateiMu tongtong,
Hatangku ampa parlahouhu, ningon ipuji do GoranMu.

1. Ham do ipuji uhurhon Jahowa Tuhankin
Huambilankon do tongtong, ganup binaen-Mu in

2. Hubotoh Ham do bona ni na dear haganup
Ibere Ham buei hunjin bannami haganup

3. Ai aha ma na dong hinan bannai na sombuh on.
Ganup ibere Ham hinan, o Naibata tongon.

4. Ai Ham do na margogoh in, sitompa haganup.
Ham do na pagoluhkon in, marmuduhon ganup.

5. Bai langit na marganjang in, na herbang songon kaen
Marribu-ribu bintang in, tor ise ma mambaen.

6. Ai ise na malayak in, manonggor hita on
Na mangarbahi juma in, pagoluh haganup.

7. Gok omei ganup hobon in, humbani ise da.
Ampa ganup panganon in, lang humbai Naibata.

8. O Naibata, Ham do bayak, sibere hanai on
Ai Ham do na tongtong layak, manumpak jolma on.

9. Ihata Ham pe hanai on, halani dousa in.
Irik do holong-Mu tongtong, mangidah ganup in.

10. Ai anggo pusok uhurhin, halani dousangkin
Urah do mulak uhur-Mu, manasap salahkin.

11. Ham do mangapoh haganup, na pusok uhur in
Iapus Ham do haganup, iluh-iluh ni in.

12. Sai ihirahon Ham hape bani dunia on.
Bai daging pakon tonduy pe, itongos Ham tongtong.

13. Ale tonduyhu hope da, sai ulang ho jornok.
Hatundalanmu Naibata, sitompa haganup.

14. Seng ongga salah Naibata, bai ginomgom-Ni in.
Ibahen barang aha da, dear do ujung nin.

15. Paturut Naibata gelah patorsa langkahmin.
Ase tongtong sonang ho lah, timbul ‘pa tuahmin.

1. Porini dong maribu hali, paraloling ni sorangkin
Bois ni gogoh inggananni, mamuji Naibatanta in,
Ibaen malasni uhurhin, hinorhon ni pambaen-Ni in.

2. Ai ambit ondos ma sorangku, bai ujung ni dunia on,
sagala jolma arahonku, mamuji Naibata tongtong.
Talup do gok ni uhurhin, hubaen pasangap Tuhan in.

3. Ulang ma modom ho tonduyhu, sai puho ho, sai hehe ma.
Pongkut ma ho bani horjamu, sai puji Tuhan Naibata.
Sai baen ma gok ni pandeimin, laho mamuji Tuhan in.

4. Tarima kasih ma uhurhu, Bamu o Naibata tongtong.
Ibahen dearni layak-Mu, binere-Mu hubangku on.
Ai ipatudu Ham tongtong ganup na porlu bangku on.

5. Hupuji pakon Ham, o Jesus, ibaen parholong ateiMu.
Mardingat darohMu madurus, pakon ganupan layak-Mu.
Mambahen haluahon on, hubai pardousa banggal on.

6. Ham pe homa, Tonduy Napansing, sai jalo Ham ma dodingkon.
Margogoh anjaha matunggung do Ham, mangapoh uhurhon
Ia hubaen na dear in, halani gogoh-Mu do in.

7. Ai ise do mamasu-masu, au on o Naibata, lang Ham?
Pamatang rap pakon tonduyhu, sai iparmudu-mudu Ham
Jaha lumbang uhur-Mu in mangidah pardousaonkin.

8. Sai layakMu do pujionku sadokah na manggoluh au.
Sai Goran-Mu pasangaponku sadokah na marhosah au
Ronsi rotap ni hosahkin, sai pujionku Ham ijin.

9. Sai jalo ma, ale Tuhanku, pamujingkon na hurang in.
Paima das au on hu surga, ianan na gok dear in,
Marlaksa hali ma ijin, dodingkononku Tuhankin.

1. O Jesus hasomani hanami haganup
Pasada uhur nami, ase torang ganup

2. Seng boi dalanonnami sanlangkah na torsa:
Dob Ham hasomannami. torang age huja.

3. Sai Ham hasomannami, ase ganup jorei.
Ganupan munsuhnami, mangunduk talu bei.

4. Songon hasomannami, urupi hanai on:
Bai hasosakannami, na i dunia on.

5. Parorot Ham hanami, na dob jabolon-Mu
Ampa hasomannami, sai ondos ma Bamu.

6. Dob bois bohalnami, holong ma atei-Mu.
Pamasuk tonduy nami, bai hasonangan-Mu.

7. Sai tenger do uhurhu mardingat Hata-Mu;
Ham do hatundalanku, bai paruhuman-Mu.

1. Tuhan Naibata, sai parorot Ham.
Daging pakon tonduy nami, in ma na pinindo nami
sai pajorgit Ham, ganup hanai on

2. Jesus Ham botul, Raja na bujur
Ham paluah tonduy nami, humbai pardousaonnami:
Pasu Ham tongtong ganup hanai on.

3. Sai papansing Ham, janah rajai Ham,
Ham ale Tonduy Napansing, uhurnai gabe napansing,
Bani Hata-Mu, songon nidok-Mu.

1. Paturut Ham bennami, 0 Jesus holong-Mu
Ase ulang hanami, itipu munsuh- Mu

2. Palongkot Ham, o Tuhan, bannai hata-Mu in
ase roh tuahnami sadokah-dokah nin.

3. Sinondang-Mu patotap, ale Panondang in,
na kahou pe sai alop hun parlajangan in.

4. Paturut Ham bennami tongtong panumpak-Mu
paganda Ham bennami holongni atei-Mu.

5. Panjaga-Mu patotap bannai jabolon-Mu
ulang hanai tarolat ibahen munsuh-Mu.

6. Paturut Ham, o Tuhan, bannai bujur-Mu in
sonai ‘ge hatotapan padaoh Ham dousa in.

1. Na ijon do au Tuhanku namanombah hu Bamu
Ganup iluh ni matangku, hu sombahkon hu Bamu.
Uhur-Mu mando hubangku, na masihol au Bamu.

2. Pardimata Ham uhurhu, rajai Ham ma diringkon
Ham do tong pangarapanku, sipagoluh tonduyhon
Uhur-Mu na mando bangku, bangku Ham Bamu au on.

3. Holong atei-Mu hubangku, in hupindo hu Bamu
Sibereon-Mu Tuhanku, bai sijalo Hata-Mu.
Uhur-Mu ma lah hubangku, pasaud Ham ma Hata-Mu.

4. Ham do mata ni aringku, sipamalas uhurhin.
Na masihol do tonduyhu hu Bamu, o Jesuskin.
Uhur-Mu ma lah hubangku, ase sabou uhurhin.

5. Sai tangihon, itangiskon uhurhon sombuhni in.
Sai tangihon, itangiskon tonduyhon siholni in.
Uhur-Mu ma bai uhurhu, sai Bamu ma tonduyhon.
6. Habayakon, halilian, uhur ni dunia on
in do gabe parsahitan, na parah bai uhurhon.
Ham ma lah hinasiholan, hutundalhon tanoh on.

1. O Jesus Panondang i dunia on
Mulani na torang tangar hatangkon
Sai holong atei-Mu bai pardousa on
Ham ma mangapohi namarhoru on

2. Sasap Ham dousangku ale Tuhankin
halani daroh-Mu na madurus in
Ulang lang uhurhu lanjar soh Bamu
halani sahit-Mu pakon daroh-Mu.

3. Tonduy, daging uhur ampa gogoh nin,
Ulang bai na sambor, sai Bamu ma in!
Ningon gok Bamu ma au hinopkop-Mu.
Ase saud martuah au jabolon-Mu.

1. Sai jolom Ham tangan ku, sai togu au
Ronsi rotap hosahku, parorot au;
Na dong au ra mardalan, sahalak au
Sai Ham ma ale Tuhan manogu au

2. Baluti Ham uhurhu na horu in.
Bai holong na tarsulur na banggal in.
Sai sasap Ham dousangku, ale Tuhan.
Sai gok Bamu uhurhu hunjon hujan.

3. Ai anggo hasunsahan, buei do in
Sonai pe pangahapan, sonang do in
Age golap huidah i tanoh on
torang do marpangidah bai uhurhon.

4. Bai jampal-Mu o Tuhan, i lobei-Mu.
Paturut Ham marsaran jabolon-Mu.
Pitpit hubaen matangku manjolom Ham.
Ai sonang do uhurhu na rongkon Ham.

5. Sal jolom Ham tanganku, sai togu au.
Ronsi rotap hosahku jagai Ham au.
Patorang Ham langkahku hu surga in.
Ham ma patunggungonku tongtong ijin.

1. O, Jesus Tuhan nami, sai tonggor hanai on
Holong ma ham bannami, paluah hanai on.

2. Irikkononkonnami ganupan titah-Mu;
Tadingkononkonnami gigi ni uhur-Mu.

3. Sihol botohonnami naha parsahitnin,
itaron Tuhannami bai na tarsilang in.

4. Ganupan dousanami iporsan Ham ijin,
‘se ulang matei holi, ibahen dousa in.

5. Ai pe, 0 Tuhannami, tumpaki hata in,
masuk ‘bai uhurnami, sai longkot ma ijin .

1. O Hasoman na tarhurung, bani pardousaon in.
Hagoluhan na sumurung, siambilanonkonkin.
Ipatidak Naibatanta, holong ni atei-Ni in.
Ai isuruh do Anak-Ni baen hagoluhanta in.

2.Hatundalan do Anak-Ni, na roh hu dunia on,
paluahkon humbai dousa hita na madursat on.
Jesus Kristus in do goran ni hatundalanta in;
Ai Tuhanta do manaron utang ni pardousa in.

3. Jesus Kristus do manogu au hu hasonangan in;
Iarahkon do tonduyhu bai hasangapon-Ni in,
ase ulang be madorun au na pusok uhur on,
janah lang dong be mandorun na pajutkon uhurhon.

4. Ia roh pe hamateian, Jesus do mangapoh au.
Roh pe ari paruhuman, Jesus mangkahui au;
Aha be habiaranku? Jesus hatundalankin;
Ai ma ase pujionku holong ni atei-Ni in.

1. Tangar ma ambilan in, nasiam na pusok uhur
Domma sasap utangmin, dousa pe ganupan mambur
Halani holong-Ni in, Anak ni Naibata in

2. In ma Tuhan Jesus in; Sipaluah manisia;
Itadingkon surga in, ase gabe jolma Ia .
Durus do daroh-Ni in, ase sasap dousa in.

3. Tangar nasiam ganup, ganupan na pusok uhur;
Seng anjai tarbuang be, halak na martenger uhur.
Bai Tuhanta Jesus in, na mangkopkop haganup.

1. Jesus roh hanai hujon, lao mangindo hagoluhan
Ai pe roh ma Ham hujon, janah baen ma pardomuan
Tonduy-Mu pa tonduy nami ulang merap uhur nami.

2. Golap uhurnami on, nin homa pambotoh nami.
Anggo seng Tonduy-Mu in, paliharhon uhurnami.
Ningon Ham do patureihon dalan sidogeionnami.

3. Sondang humbai Naibata, haliharon roh hun datas,
Baen torsa sondangi ma uhurnami ase megah
Lao manjalo hagoluhan, pinasirsir-Mu o Tuhan.

1. Hata-Mu ale Tuhanku, arta siharganan ai
Sai palongkot bai uhurhu, ulang lang hujolom ai
Anggo seng be sijoloman Hata na madear ai
aha ma na baen onjolanni haporsayaonkin

2. Ale Jesus sai kawahkon, sai parorot Ham au on
‘Se totap haporsayaon mangiankon uhurhon
Sai paringgas Ham uhurhu, manangihon Hata ai
Sai horahan bai podah-Mu, songon si Maria ai

3. Sada horjaonkonnami, ipindo uhur-Mu in
Ningon holong ateinami, bai hasomannami in
Ase roh ma gogohnami, manghorjahon Hata-Mu
Manghahulhon diri nami, bai hasoman ‘pa Bamu

1. Damei do nimu bereon, Jesus bani bangsa-Mu,
Tonduy-Mu do pasaudkon, hata bai jabolon-Mu,
Na doyuk janah masombuh, au seng patut rongkon Ham
Tonduy Na Pansing ma suruh ‘se gogoh manombah Ham.

2. Ale Tonduy Sipardamei sai masuki hanai on.
Sai pasada uhurnami, ‘se marbuah ganup on.
Sai tangima pinggol nami lao manangar ojur-Mu;
Ase tambah ringgas nami pararatkon hata- Mu.

3. Sada horjaonkon nami, ipindo uhur-Mu in;
Ningon holong atei nami, bai hasomannami in
Ase roh ma gogohnami, mangkorjahon hata-Mu.
Mangkahulhon diri nami bai hasoman ‘pa Bamu.

1. Haleluya ari Minggu, ari sidearan in
Anggo diri lao martumpu, ‘pa hasoman Kristen in.
Ari na sumurung in, pamalaskon uhur in

2. Na marsaran do tonduyhu bani ari Minggu in.
Ganup pusok ni uhurhu huogapkon do ijin.
Das hubagas uhur ni Jesus Kristus Tuhankin.

3. Parhorjaan ari-ari hutadingkon do ijin ,
Ase hupasari-sari goluh partonduyon in.
Arta siharganan in jumpah au bai Minggu in.

4. Harosuh-Mu, 0 Tuhanku sihol bahenonku tong .
Hupadear parlahouhu pasangapkon Ham tongtong.
“Hiou hapintoron” in bere Ham bai tonduyhin.

5. Sai papuho Ham uhurhu, sai ajari Ham au on.
‘Ge pangapoh na tarsulur tongos Ham bai uhurhon.
Baen sombuh sadari on, ‘ge horah ni tonduyhon.

6. Pasu-pasu ma ambilan i kuria-Mu ganup.
Sai pasorap bai Pandita, ge parhorja pe ganup.
Tonduy-Mu Na Pansing in marhidorat baen ijin.

7. Sai pabayu Ham ma padan bai na porsaya Bamu .
Sai pagogoh Ham susian pasangap kon goran-Mu .
Tonggo pakon dodingnin, tangar Ham ganupan in.

8. Sai urupi au Tuhanku manipat sadari on .
Bogei Ham pangindoanku songon na pinungkahkon;
Sai huhasiholi ma minggu-Mu , o Naibata,

Laho luar masuk pe, Jesus Ham hasoman nami
Pasupasu hanai bei pakon pargoluhan nami
Togu Ham hanai o Tuhan
Das hubani hasonangan

Sai Amen huhatahon, pabulus Ham uhurhu manjalo hata-Mu
Uhurhu pe tongtong, o Jesus Tuhan nami, marhitei-hitei Tonduy-Mu

Jesus do haholonganta, na manobus hita humbai dousa
Marhitei daroh-Niin
Daging ampakon tonduyta, hu Bani ma ondoskon hita
‘se sonang ilambung-Ni in
Sai jalo hanai on, Kuria-Mu do on, hu Bamu ma!
Ganupan on, tumpaki Ham, holong ni atei-Mu do in.

Na martumpu do hanai ganupan, lao padomu tangan in
Hubai darohMu do patoguhon, sai totap Bamu ma in
Jesus sai patugah Ham bannami
Rosuh-Mu ma dodingkonon nami
Sai hatahon Ham Tuhan, “Ondos ma damei hubam”

1. Pasu-pasu Ham ma, ale Tuhan nami
Sai sondangkon bohi-Mu, bai na humpul on ganup

2. Bere Ham bannami damei ari-ari.
Sai pasaor ma Tonduy-Mu bai na humpul on ganup.

3. Amen hatanami ale Tuhan nami.
Siparholong atei in sangap ma bai goran-Mu!

1. Malas ma uhur nima, na pintor uhur in
Domma roh Raja nima, mamboan tuah in
Seng marpanrantam in anggo bani parroh-Ni;
Naipe tuk do gogoh-Ni padaoh dorunta in.

2. Seng ipindo uhur-Ni ijon sangap-Ni in;
I surga paratas-Ni, harajaon-Ni in.
Ai tarponop ope i tanoh on tunggung-Ni;
Dob das ganup horja-Ni talar ma in use.

3. Ganupan hita jolma tangihon Raja on.
Ai baen hagoluhanta do Ia ase roh.
Ai hita na lansei na manlawan Hata -Ni.
Roh do holi gila-Ni manguhum hita bei .

4. Ganupan na marsangap na i dunia on.
Tuhanta lobih sangap bai hasiangan on.
Tangihon Hata in sai ulang be pahengkeng .
Sai tong parimbagaskon ibagas uhurmin.

5. Ho, na pusokan uhur i atas tanoh on .
lbaen dursat ni uhur na i dunia on;
Sai misir nasiam padurgak ulunima.
Ai habayakonnima do Jesus na roh bam.

6. Podas ma ulakan-Ni roh bani jolma in.
Ganup hasangapon-Ni taridah ma ijin.
Sai misir hita on hulobei ni Rajanta;
Nahiti bei suluhta barah ma Ia roh.

1. Patahar ma horbangan in, ai domma roh Rajanta in,
Sigomgom raja hahanup, sitobus jolma haganup.
Siboan haluahon in, palulak hasonangan in,
Inpe napuji ma, Tuhanta Naibata

2. Pintor tumang do uhur-Ni na roh hu bani jolma in;
Ai Raja parhidorat do, janah parholong atei do.
Usiron-Nin do hajojor, na manunsahi hita on.
In pe na puji rna Tuhanta Naibata.

3. Martuah do nagori in, dob ijalohon Raja in;
Uhurta pe sai sonang do dob masuk Raja in na roh.
Lihar tumang uhurta in, dob roh Panondang in hujin.
In pe na puji ma Tuhanta Naibata.

4. O Jesus, roh ma Ham hujon , domma huungkab uhurhon.
Patuduh hinaholong-Mu, ondoskon hinalayak-Mu.
Marhitei-hitei Tonduy-Mu, bobai ma au hu surga in.
Ase tongtong ijin hupuj i goran-Mu.

1. Naha ma panjalongku, Bamu o Tuhankin?
Naha panjumpahkonku, Bamu o Rajangkin?
Sondangi Ham uhurhu, na golap na bodoh
Ai sihol bahenonku do hamegahon-Mu

2. Ganupan par-Sion-Mu do mangolobkon Ham
Sonin homa uhurhu lao mangayaki Ham
Na megah do uhurhu mamuji goran-Mu
Bujur sura-surangku pasaudkon rosuh-Mu

3. Ai seng be dong na hurang pinasirsir-Mu on
Mambaen hubangku suang damei ni uhurhon
Marhoru pe uhurhu halani dousangkin
Roh do Ham Sipagoluh pamalum uhurhin

4. Ai marhalani aha ‘se porlu uhur-Mu
Roh bani manisia, anggo lang holong-Mu?
Ham parholong ni uhur bai na tarsosak in
Ase ulang tarambur ganup na magou in

5. Ai na tarsangkut ahu, Ham mananggali ahu
Bai na tartutup ahu, Ham paluahkon au
Ham do na pasangapkon na madorun hinan
Ham do na pabayakkon na masombuh hinan

6. Ganup na pusok uhur halani dousa in
Tangihon hata mungmung na roh hun surga in
Ai roh ma Sipagoluh isuruh Bapa in
Pasonang uhurnima mamboan damei in

7. Seng be habiaranmu, pangagou in ganup
Ai domma roh Rajamu, manlawan in ganup
Maporus do ganup, i baen Rajanta in
Rendep ma haganupan, ilobei-lobei-Nin

8. Tuhanta roh magira, bai paruhuman in
Ijin ningon maila, na teos uhur in
Na marholong no atei, malas ma uhurnin
Ijin hataonkonni, “Napuji na roh in”

1. Hanima na porsaya in, sai alo-alo Jesus in,
pahinsah uhur nima
Dohor ma ari pesta ni ganupan Kuria-Ni in,
bai ari partubuh-Ni
In pe laho ma hanima baen adatni manjalohon,
na marayak hajolmaon

2. Marmegah-megah uhur ma, sagala na bujur homa,
lao mangirikkon Jesus
In pe rombang patidak ma, megahmu bani Naibata
Pasaud ma harosuh-Ni
Puji, puji Jesus Kristus na manobus tonduy nima
Humbai hamagouan nima

3. Lungkari uhurnima bei, ingati dousanima bei,
porluhon uhurnima.
Tarima Sipagoluh in, ai turun do hun surga in,
manggalar utangnima.
Tanda hata hagoluhan na binoan ni Tuhanta,
pasaloseihon dousanta.

4. Ai anggo lang iboban ho, dousamu bani Jesus roh,
seng saud be ho maluah.
Tongtong ma sogop ringis ni Jahowa, Naibatanta in,
hu bam na pag manahan.
Patut, ganup dousa pakon hinasambor ni uhurmu,
pasasapkon bai Tuhanmu.

5. Jahowa, holong atei-Mu, kawahkon ma Kuria-Mu,
sai togu uhurnami.
Bai Jesus Kristus, Anak in, na roh hu manisia in,
mambahen tuahnami.
Lanjar, bujur baen hanami mandalani bai na sonang,
das bani inagori atas.

1. Hosianna, Anak ni Raja David roh hubanta
Parandang ma dalan-Niin, ase masuk bai uhurta
Baen ma gaba-gaba in, bai Tuhanta na roh in

2. Hosianna, Roh ma Ham, das hubagas uhurnami
Na mangalo-alo Ham, alo Jesus Tuhannami
Malas uhurnami in, anggo masuk Ham hujin

3. Hosianna! Raja ni na mardamei, Jagoraha!
Ganup binoban-Mu in, damei, sonang na maharga.
Hanai hinopkop-Mu in do simada ganup in.

4. Hosianna! Torih ma hanai na nirajaan-Mu.
Togu ma bai Naibata, hang ganup susian-Mu;
Sai papuho hanai on, mangiahon hata-Mu.

5. Hosianna! Saud tarbaen bagah-bagah ni Jahowa.
‘Ge ponop ope nuan, hasangapon-Mu bai jolma.
Ganup na porsaya in, manandai gogoh-Mu in.

6. Hosianna! Tatap ma hanai on ganup, o Tuhan.
‘Se pangia tong homa, hanai na i hasombuhan.
Bai Hata na dear in, ase na pasaud in.

7. Hosianna! Anak ni Naibata na jadi jolma.
Tohu ma Kuria in, ase sai tongtong martuah.
Sangap bai goran-Mu in, sadokah-dokahni in.

judul: Bai na saborgin in do binsar
lirik:
1. Bai na saborngin in do binsar Panondang ni tonduita in
Padaohkon haganup na sursar, laho palihar ganup in
Sondangon ni Panondang on use ganup dunia on.

2. Ai anggo ho, ale tonduyhu, tarima ma Panondang in!
Ulang das mapas da uhurmu halani haetekon-Nin
Usiron-Nin do haganup, sibolis ampa dousa rup.

3. Panondang on ma patidakkon na songga niidahta in.
Halani ai sai hagoluhkon sondang-Ni in bai tonduymin;
Ai in do hasonanganmin, age pe hansur na dong in.

4. Halani in sai marsinondang ma baen haporsayaonmin,
Padear janah sai patorang uhurmu `ge parlahoumin,
Tanda marparayakan do hubam: Panondang in na roh.

5. Jesus, Panondang sidearan na pasonangkon uhurhin,
Tonduyhu baen bai hamulakan hu surga bai ianan-Mu.
Sai pujionku Ham ijin, sadokah ni dokahni in.

1. Riap ma hita haganup mamuji Naibata
Mesek ma pandodingta rup,
Ai in do na tama, ai in do natama

2.Iungkab Naibatanta in nagori atas in
Isuruh do Anak ni in,
Hagoluhanta in, hagoluhanta in

3. Paratas ni BapaNi do, tinadingkoNi in
Hu hasiangan Ia roh,
ianan marsik ini, ianan marsik in

4. Sitompa sagala na dong, panggomgom haganup
Roh do Ia hu tahon on,
mandagei haganup, mandagei haganup

5. Halani in malas tumang, do uhurhin nuan
Hujolom Jesus in tongon,
ai sonang au ibaen, ai sonang au ibaen

6. Antong ganupan nasiam, pardousa na horu
Buhai uhurmu ranahan, manjalo Jesusmu, manjalo Jesusmu

7. Ringgas ma hita haganup, mamuji Naibata
Gomos ma pandodingta rup,
Amen Haleluya, Amen, Haleluya

judul: Naroh hun datas do au on
lirik:
1. Na roh hun datas do au on, ambilan na madear do
Anjaha na jenges tumang hubobam bani nasiam.

2.Domma tubuh saborngin on, Anak ni anak boru on.
Anak na majenges tumang, baen hamegahon nasiam.

3. In ma Tuhanmu, Kristus in, manlangkon hadorsaon in.
Sibere tuah hu bamu, pakon sisasap dousamu.

4. lboban hagoluhan in, siluah ni Bapa-Ni in.
Ai sol bai Harajaon-Nin, paulakon-Ni joima in.

5. On ma tandani torih ham; bai harang in ma dapot ham,
tibal bai panggagatan do, janah na binalutan do.

6. Sonin ma da ambilan in, tinongos bai parmahan in;
Bai haganupan jolma pe, itongos Naibata ope.

7. On pe uhurhu, tanda ma, ganupan in patangkas ma;
Ai ise na dob tubuh in? In ma Jesus, huanta in.

8. Diatei ma Ham roh Tuhan, sombuhku iayaki Ham,
Maharga bai uhur-Mu in, au jolma na tarbuang in.

9. Longang tumang do uhurhin, mangidah paridop-Mu in;
Ai gok Bamu pe tanoh on, dihut do Ham bai sombuhkon.

10. O Jesus, haholongankin, masuki pakon uhurhin;
pamisir Ham hunjin payo, na ra mangagou au alo.

11. Haleluya, Haleleya! Domma roh banta Naibata.
Martuah hita baenon-Nin, sadokah ni dokahni in.

1. Sai roh ma bai harang i Betlehon on
Ganup na porsaya podas ma hujon
Manonggor hamegahni uhurta in ijin
Tinongos ni Bapa na isurga in

2. Sai tonggor hanima ma bai harang on,
ai tubuh Dakdanak ijon borngin on.
Jenges do rupa-Ni, mata-Ni torang,
sai torih ma Ia, ho jadi siang.

3. Megah si maria ‘pa si Josep in,
mangidah Dakdanak, na dob tubuh in,
Manombah hu Bani do parmahan in,
ibabou mandoding do parsurga in.

4. Manrogop hanima ganupan ale
Maniru parmahan manombah use
Mandoding hanima megahkon ijin
Usihi Malekat na hun babou in.

5. Hatahon: Ham Anak ni Naibata in,
roh Ham roh hun datas ibaen idopNIn.
Bannami ganup na mardousa on,
mambaen haluahon bannami tongtong.

6. Tor aha ma nani baen molos-Mu,
bereonkonnami hamegahon-Mu?
Ai omas ‘ge pirak seng sihol Bamu,
ai uhur na pansing do harosuh-Mu.

7. Antong uhurnami berean-Mu in,
o Jesus Tuhanku sai jalo Ham in.
Pansing janah sonang baen Ham uhurhin,
tongtong ma mardomu ba uhur-Mu in.

1. Mandoding nasiam! On ma hatahon ham
Sihaholonganta do Anak-anakon
parayakon hita hu atas tanoh on
Tuhankin do Ham, Tuhankin do Ham

2. Masihol au Bamu, o Jesus na dob roh!
Apoh Ham uhurhu sadokah au ijpn,
holong atei-Mu bangku mangidah sombuhkon!
Togu au bamu, togu au Bamu!

3. Layak do Bapa in, isuruh Anak-Nin,
ase galaron-Ni ganup utangta in,
janah pasirsiron-Ni hasonanganta in.
Ambit das ma au, ambit das ma au.

4. Tongtong i surga in, hasonanganta in,
sai marmegah-megah ganup malekat in,
ampakon na mapansing na dob osdos ijin.
Sol hujin ma au, sol hujin ma au.

1. Puji hita ma Tuhanta, sai hu Bani ma uhurta
Ase mogah pandodingta, hita halak Kristen in.

2. Dosa pakon hamateian, bolis pakon hamagouan
Talu sabab do iboan, Jesus hagoluhon in

3. Botoh ma dear ni layak, ni Jahowa in na bayak
Iberehon age Anak bahen hagoluhan in.

4. Ai talar holong atei-Ni, jolma do ibaen huan-Ni
masuk bai harajaon-Ni, hita arahkonon-Ni do.

5. Domma binsar Panondang-Ni, hagolapan isondangi
Na masihol i tambari, i pagoluh haganup

6. Ale Jesus, haholongan, boban ma bai hasonangan
hanai na i pardagangan, na masihol roh Bamu.

7. Hu Bamu ma roh hanami mandodingkon dodinghnami
rap ampa hasomannami ganup i surga in.

1. Hatuahon do hamegahon do partubuhonni Jesus in
Roh Sipaluah bani na magou, megah-megah ma uhurta in
Roh Sipaluah bani na magou, megah-megah ma uhurta in

2. Hatuahon do hamegahon do partubuhon ni Jesus in
Rapat ma hita, bai Naibatanta, megah-megah ma uhurta in
Rapat ma hita, bai Naibatanta, megah-megah ma uhurta in

2. Hatuahon do hamegahon do partubuhon ni Jesus in
Megah uhurta bani Tuhanta, megah-megah ma uhurta in
Megah uhurta bani Tuhanta, megah-megah ma uhurta in

1. I Betlehem do tuhuh Anak na banta in.
Indo halak na bujur, hutodoh Rajangkin,
Indo, in do hutodoh Rajangkin

2. Gok bai holong atei-Ni namando uhurhon
Hubere ma hu-Bani ganup na bangku on
Nai ma, naima, ganup na bangku on.

3. Sihol haholonganku tongtong Ham, Tuhankin.
Age pusok uhurhu, sai ganda holongkin.
Nai ma, naima, sai ganda holongkin.

4. Botul ondoskononku Bamu ma uhurhon
Sai holong ma atei-Mu, urupi au tongtong
Nai ma, naima, urupi au tongtong.

5. Usih songon dagingku Ham, Naibata hinan;
Bamu au sol mardomu, Ham artangkin nuan.
Nai ma, naima, Ham artangkin nuan.

6. Sai ulang sriang hita, poltik panrahutmin,
Bai holong ni ateita, o Jesus, Tuhankin
Tong ma, tong ma, Bamu ma uhurhon.

1. Sonangni, bornginni in, sanggah roh Jesus in
Sonang modom do halak ganup dua mando na puho in rup
Mangoromi AnakNi Jesus Tuhanta in

2. Dear ni bornginni in sanggah roh Jesus in
Bai parmahan i Betlehem in, ipatugah na hun surga in
Domma roh Sipagoluh, Jesus Tuhanta in

3. Buei ni tuah ijin, sanggah roh Jesus in
Tor maluah pardousa use, humbai hamagouanNi hape
Ben na roh Sipagoluh, Jesus Tuhanta in.

1. Borngin na mapansing in tuah do binoban-Min
Ai itongos Naibatanta do Anak-Ni jadi jolma
Halaninin na puji ma na roh humbai Naibata.

2. Haganup pardousa pe seng tarbuang be hape;
Ipaluah Jesus hita humbai haganup dousanta.
‘Ge na golap in hape, ipalihar Jesus do.

3. Sangap ma bai Tuhan in, na mamboan damei in.
Na mambahen manisia harosuh ni Naibata.
Borngin na mapansings in, in do na binoban-Min.

judul: Domma jumpah use ari pesta in
lirik:
1. Domma jumpah use ari pesta in,
partubuhanni Tuhanta Jesus in
Turun hape la roh hun surga in,roh manohu hujon
Hasangapon bai Naibata, damei damei bani jolma
Megah uhur ni Naibata, hajolmaon use

2. Laita hita misir hu Betlehem in,
Sombah hita ma Dakdanak na ijin,
Tinongoskon ni Parholong atei in, Naibata, Bapa in,
Hasangapon bai Naibata, damei damei bani jolma
Megah uhur ni Naibata, hajolmaon use

3. Sombah nami hu Bamu na dob roh on,
Ham siboan damei hu dunia on
Sai pasorap Ham bai uhur namion, dameiMu o Jesus
Hasangapon bai Naibata, damei damei bani jolma
Megah uhur ni Naibata, hajolmaon use

1. Tutuho na martunas do bai si Jese in.
Tubuh na etek-etek na binagahkon in.
In am Tuhanta in, sinuruh ni Bapa-Ni, roh banta jolma on.

2. Tunas na hinatahon ni si Jesaya in.
In do tinubuhkon ni si maria in.
Na jumpah ma ijin na binagah-bahakon ni Naibatanta in.

3. Jenges tumang rupa-Ni na masrsinalsal in.
‘ge masombuh Ia, na gabe jolma in.
Lihar baenon-Nin uhu ni hita jolma na bai na golap in.

4. Napuji ma homani, ‘par holong atei in;
Ibere do Anak-Ni hagoluhanta in.
Megah ma hita on mamuji Naibatanta ibaen layak-Ni in

5. O Jesus, Tuhannami na roh hu tanoh on,
Bai hasombuhannami i hasiangan on.
Holong na atei-Mu sai togu tonduynami bai hasangapon-Mu.

1. O Jesuskin hupuji Ham, halani jadi jolma Ham
Roh Ham marayak hanai on, na sombuh i dunia on

2.Tibal bai panggagatan in, do Anakni Jahowa in;
Parrupei bai daagingta on, do na pagoluh hita on.

3. Sigomgom haganupan in, do na tibal bai harang in;
Mandagei na masahit do, na marmuduhon hita on.

4. Tuhanta na torang hinan, na sangap humbani na hinan,
do paliharhon tanoh on, lao manondangi hita on

5. Diri-Ni ipalumei do, sangap-Ni itadingkon do,
manogu hajolmaon in, bai Naibata Bapa-Ni in.

6. Masombuh do Tuhanta in, manaron na masahit in
bayak ma hita baenon-Nin, sadokah ni dokahni in.

7. In ma binaen ni Jesus in, na patidakkon holong ni
atei-Ni na tongtong layak, puji ma Naibata bayak.

1. Pamalas uhurta do partubuhni
Jesus Sipaluah haholongankin
Jesus Sipauah haholonghankin

2. Ai buei do dosa, parlajouan pe
manunsahi hita ronsi matei pe
manunsahi hita ronsi matei pe

3. Maparah tumang do hamagouan in
Anggo lang roh Jesus Sipaluah in
Anggo lang roh Jesus Sipaluah in

4. Tuhan Naibatangku, Jesus Ham do in.
Seng anjai marhoru na porsaya in.
Seng anjai marhoru na porsaya in.

5. Sabou do uhurhu, Jesus ibaen Ham.
Damei ‘pa tuahku do ibere Ham.
Damei ‘pa tuahku do ibere Ham.

6. Marhasoman Jesus gok ma dear-Nin,
bangku pe paondos Ham rosuh-Mu in,
bangku pe paondos Ham rosuh-Mu in.

7. Ambit haganupan do mananda Ham,
tontu sai marrohan do marayak Ham,
tontu sai marrohan do marayak Ham.

8. Ai malas ni uhur na masahit pe,
sai bai na madear do manumpak bei,
sai bai na madear do manumpak bei.

9. Ikawahkon Jesus do hun surga in,
halak na tinobus manisia in,
halak na tinobus manisia in.

10. Holsohmin ganupan iahapkon do,
sai pasonangon-Ni na niain-Ni in,
sai pasonangon-Ni na niain-Ni in.

11. Tatang-tatangon-Ni na porsaya in,
sai paondoson-Ni bai na sonang in,
sai paondoson-Ni bai na sonang in.

12. Sai marmegah-megah do ijin hape,
Amen, haleluya do dodingni bei,
Amen, haleluya do dodingni bei.

1. Malas ni uhur na banggal na huambilankon on
Domma tubuh Sipaluah bai hita jolma on
Sangap bani Naibatanta, damei damei damei ma bani jolma
Malas uhur ni Naibatanta, bai hita jolma on

2.Ai saborngin on do poltak bintang bai na golap in
Na lao palihar na golap bani uhurta in
Sangap bani Naibatanta, damei damei damei ma bani jolma
Malas uhur ni Naibatanta, bai hita jolma on

3. Jesus do pardomuanta sinuruh ni Naibata.
Pasalosei ganup dosa ni hita haganup
Sangap bani Naibatanta, damei damei damei ma bani jolma
Malas uhur ni Naibatanta, bai hita jolma on

4. Sai sondangi ma uhurhu, Jesus, ham do Tuhankin.
‘Se marparulihan ahu bai partubuh-Mu
Sangap bani Naibatanta, damei damei damei ma bani jolma
Malas uhur ni Naibatanta, bai hita jolma on

5.Malas ni uhur na banggal, sai sogopi uhurhin.
Ase dihut au pabanggal Goran na Mapansing in.
Sangap bani Naibatanta, damei damei damei ma bani jolma
Malas uhur ni Naibatanta, bai hita jolma on

1. Satahun use ma surutni, surut homa ma umurhin
Naha do au na sain dokahni, margagan do parlahouhin
Ganda do haporsayaonku ‘ge holong ni ateihu pe
Bai Jesus pakon Naibatangku, ‘pa bai hasomankin ale

2. Porini matei au sonari, huja ma nani tonduyhin?
Bia hasonangan holi nani rap pakon na mapansing in?
Mamuji Naibata do ahu, ibaen holong ni atei Niin
Atap na hona uhum ahu bai apuy na so miloh in

3. Porini matei au sonari, huja ma nani tonduyhin?
Bai hasonangan holi nani rap pakon na mapansing in?
Mamuji Naibata do ahu, ibaen holong atei-Ni in.
Atap na hona uhum ahu bai apuy na so miloh in?

4. Dousangku seng be tarbilangi, hubahen sain dokahni in.
Na dong tarhira be layak ni Tuhanta Jesus na dob in.
Seng ibalaskon Ham, Tuhanku, hu bangku songon dousangkin.
Lumbang do uhur-Mu hu bangku paidah-idah gabeihin.

5. Halani ai ma ‘se hupuji layakMu in sadari on
Ai na patibal ruji-ruji, sai na tarlobih do in tong
O Jesus, na marholong atei! Ningon hupuji goranMu
Ai Ham do hapeni na pandei mambere bangku layakMu

6. Holong ma atei-Mu hu bangku, mangkasomani au ijon.
Paondos Ham hu surga ahu bai parrotap ni hosahkon.
Na ra do ahu mangihutkon hata-Mu, ‘sal manggoluh au.
Malas uhurhu pararathon barita -Mu ronsi daoh

1. Ma dapot tahun baru on hubangku ibaen Jesus
Ibaen uhur-Ni bangku on layak-Ni ipatorus
Ai Ia do manogu au, ganup na dorsa ipadaoh
na pamalas uhurhu.

2. Halani ai hupuj i Ham, 0 Jesus Naibatangku;
Ai seng ongga marsaran Ham mambaen hatuahonku.
Uhurhu panuratan ni hinabuei ni layak-Mu,
ai Ham do pangurupi.

3. Ai pe anggo hunjon hujan Ham pangunsagahonk on;
Mahansur pe dunia on, martuah au manongtong .
Ai malas uhur pusok pe, manggoluh barang matei pe,
Ham do hatuahonku.

4. Bai Bapa pakon Anak-Nin ampa Tonduy Na Pansing,
ganupan hasangapon in! Ulang be dong na tading!
Sai puji ma pinujingkon, rap ma mangunsagahkon on.
sintong do tong uhur-Ni.

1. Naibata hasomanmin, lao mangkorjahon horjamu
Ia do pangajamanmu, sai patoruh uhurmi
Naibata hasomanmin, Naibata hasomanmin

2. Naibata hasomanmin! Anggo rapkon Naibata do.
seng tarbahen ho be kahou, sai torang do langkahmin.
Naibata hasomanmin! Naibata hasomanmin!

3. Naibata hasomanmin! Sai na saud do horjamu,
sai das do sura-suramu, jan ah sonang uhurmin.
Naibata hasomanmin ! Naibata hasomanmin

1. Ganupan hasomanku, sai tiru ma hatangku,
mamuji Naibatanta, napagoluhkon hita.

2. Sai songon na mardalan ibolus hita tahun;
Dong do ope hosahta, isambat Naibatanta.

3. Ai na songon inangta, na tong manjaga hita,
sonin homa Tuhanta, ijaga do hosahta.

4. Tongon do, Tuhannami, seng boi jagaonnami,
tongkin pe tonduynami age pamatangnami.

5. Sai goran-Mu pujion, parlayak-Mu ganupan,
mangidah na marguna bannami na mardousa.

6. Tangihon Ham, o Tuhan, balosi pangindoan,
na dob pinadasnami Bamu, o Tuhannami.

7. Ramoti hosahnami age pamatangnami,
padaoh parsahitan ampakon hadorsaon.

8. Tumpaki Ham ma horja i juma ‘pa i huta,
pasungkup bohal nami mangudut hosahnami.

9. Ampa na lobih harga humbai ganupan arta
tumpakhon Ham bannami tonduy-Mu, Tuhannami.

10.Hubai goluh magira, sai boban Ham hanami,
manean na i surga, sadokah ni dokahni.

1. Sai na margantih tahun on sonin rosi magira
Jesus baen ham uhurhon ase tongtong marhira
Bai parsurutni ajalhin, janah manimbang ujungnin.

2. Iudut Ham do hosahkin paidah-idah ahu,
Atap na dong do buah ni horja-Mu in hu bangku;
Hape gati hiranan Ham: Buah ni in seng jumpah Ham

3. Ra ma manringis Naibata mangidah parlahouhu;
Ra ihatahon: “Roboh ma haron na so behangku;
Seng ongga ra marbuah in, benaha be marguna in!”

4. Halani kinahuhon-Mu do au, ase manggoloh;
Sonon nimu bai Bapa-Mu: Paturut ma manggoloh;
Haron, holong ma atei-Mu, taun roh pe das uhum-Mu.

5. O Jesus, au urupi ma bai tahun on mamboan,
Buah na ramos, na tama, padaoh ma hamagouan,
Sai Ham pagogoh au tongtong, pasangap Ham bai goluhkon.

1. Jesus ham do sai tongtong, bahen hatindalan nami.
Gen bai tahun baru on, ningon Ham hasoman nami.
Tanda hot do padan in, marhitehon daroh in.

2. Goran pakon hata-Mu ningon dapot do tangaron,
Ban sab kuria-Mu na megah pasirsirhon
Uhur ni gorini in bahen rumah-Mu ma in.

3. Na binahen-Mu ganup pagoluhkon tonduynami,
Huatuahon pe sungkup, sol gomos jolomonnami;
‘Ge bai tahun baru on, gok Bamu hanami on.

4. Sai marhasomankon ham ma hanami lao mardalan,
Bintang pambobai do Ham, sai tongtong bai pardalanan;
Binaen ni sondang-Mu in gabe lihar dalan in.

5. Jesus, ondos ma Bamu ganup panarononnami,
‘Ge sonaha pambaen-Mu sai marguna do bannami.
Rapkon Ham tarapoh rup uhurnami haganup.

1. Jesus tolong Ham hanami bani tahun baru on
Sai pabayu gogoh nami mangirikkon Ham tongtong
Pasu pasu Ham homa, ganup na porsaya da

2. Pingkiranku ‘pa horjangku, sai pasangap Ham ma in
Puho barang modom ahu, Ham tongtong ilambungkin
Laho luar masuk pe, Ham hasomankin use.

3. Tahun parholong ateian ma hubangku tahun on
Ham patorap hasasapan ni dousaku bangku on
Pitah Ham o, Jesuskin, boi manasap dousakin

4. Apoh Ham homa uhurhu, bai holong ni ateiMu
Janah jalo Ham tonggoku ibaen dear layakMu
Sai padaoh Ham dorunmin, ulang pusok uhurhin

5. Sai pagomos Ham uhurhu, manundalhon dousa in
Tambah ma baen Ham ringgasku mangkorjahon Hata in
Ase ulang uhurhon longkot bai dunia on

6. Sai parorot au, Tuhanku, manipat satahun on.
Tangan-Mu manogu au, anggo rotap hosahkon.
‘Se malas uhurhu lao, ia Ham mandilo au.

1. Aha ma dodingkononku ase pujionku Ham.
Ale Tuhan Naibatangku Ham ma mangurupi au.
Seng na tarpajojor ahu holong-Mu tongtong hu bangku.
Halaniin hupuji do ham marribu hali lo.

2. Sai puhoi Ham uhurhu, mandodingkong gogoh-Mu.
Ampa idop ni uhur-Mu, ronsi halayakon-Mu.
Ai sonai do isaksihon tonduy pakon pamatangku.
Halaniin hupuji do ham marribu hali lo.

3. Ai buei tumang dousaku ipingkiri uhurhin.
Tapi longang do uhurhu manimbangi holong-Mu.
Pasaloseihon dousangku, ale Tuhan Naibatangku.
Halaniin hupuji do ham marribu hali lo.

4. Haholongan, halayakon, Hata hagoluhan in.
Ampa ganup hadoyukon sai ipakei Ham do in.
Mangarahkon au na magou, masuk bai Harajaon-Mu.
Halaniin hupuji do Ham marribu hali lo.

5. Sai patoguh Ham uhurhu pasangapkon Goran-Mu.
Ampa haporsayaonku, lambin tambah ma Bamu.
Sai pamasuk Ham, o Tuhan tonduyhin bai hagoluhan.
Mandodingkon Ham ijin sadokah-dokahni in.

1. Puji tongtong Jahowa tongon
pardear gabei parholong atei sadokahni in;
pardear gabei in parholong atei in.

2. Ingat tongtong, ale tonduyhon.
Ganup na jenges, ibahen Tuhan Naibata hubam;
Dear layak-Ni do na pagoluhkon ho.

3. Seng dong tongon pargogoh tongtong.
Na songon Bapa, Tuhanta Naibata i surga in.
Gogoh tumang do in, tunggung tumang do in.

4. Jombut botul Jahowa bujur.
Na marmulia bai haganup na tinompa-Niin.
Hamuliaon ma bai Tuhan Naibata!

5. Sombah bujur Jahowa botul.
Marhahormaton ma hita bai Tuhanta Naibata.
Sai rap marsombah ma bai Tuhan Naibata.

6. Sai bujur bei mandoding ale.
Mamuji-muji Tuhan Naibata i surga in.
Pardear gabei in, na marmulia in.

1. Ungkab labah na majenges rumah ni Naibatakin;
Ai hujin do au maringgas bani ari Minggu in.
Hupindahi do ijin bohi ni Naibatangkin.

2. Domma roh au Ham Tuhanku, roh ma use Ham hujon.
Ai i rumah ianan-Mu hamegahon do tongtong.
Masuk ham bai uhurhon, rumah-Mu ma in tongtong.

3. Sai hormat ma parlahouhu dompak bohi-Mu ijin.
Suruh Ham ma bai uhurhu, Tonduymu Napansing in.
Ase sai tongtong torsa tonggo ’pa dodinghu da.

4. Doskon tanoh na lambutan ma au on Bamu tongtong
Sai sihatkon hadearon hubahas uhurhu tong.
Sai tumpaki Hata-Mu, ’se marbuah haganup.

5. Sai toguh haporsayaon bahen Ham bai uhurhon.
Ase ulang be rampason ni sibolis artangkon
Togu Ham ma au tongtong bani dalan na sintong.

6. Parsahapkon au Tuhanku, ase hutangihon Ham.
Patuduhkon Ham hubangku dalan pasangapkon Ham.
Sai pabosur Ham tongtong tonduyhon na loja on.

1. Domma roh hu parguruan hanai on na ijon
sol hu hagoluhan.
Jesus idingat hanami hata-Mu nidok-Mu
Ham hasomannami.
2. Ham patorsa uhur nami ulang lao bai na daoh.
Mampar uhur nami.
Ham patiur pinggol nami! Hata-Mu nidok-Mu.
Sol arusannami.

3. Suruh ham Tonduy Napansing ’se turei hani bei,
janah sai mapanasing.
Ase misir hakahouaon, dousa pe laho bei,
timbul hagoluhan.

4. Pabotohkon Ham bannami holong-Mu, idop-Mu,
pagoluh hanami.
Ase sai mardos ni uhur hanai on, sai tongtong
manlawan na sambor.

5. Jesus, seng ihagigihon uhur-Mu, haganup
partonggo na sintong;
In tenger ni uhurnami dompak Ham, o Tuhan
Sitobus hanami.

1. Tatap hanai on na humpul ijon
Sihol do pujion nami layak-Mu o Tuhannami.
Tatap hanai on na humpul ijon.

2. Togu hanai on, na mardousa on;
Ale Jesus Tuhannami, sai maidop ham bannami.
Togu ham tongtong na mardousa on.

3. Sai parorot Ham, ganup hanai on;
Humbai ganup munsuh nami, ulang magou be hanami;
Sai parorot Ham, ganup hanai on.

4. Sai urasi Ham ganup hanai on;
As mubah uhurnami, sai borsih ma tonduynami.
Sai urasi Ham ganup hanai on.

5. Sai ajari ham ganup hanai on;
’Se ganup botohonnami dalan sidalanannami.
Sai ajari ham ganup hanai on.

6. Sai pintori ham ganup hanai on;
Sai unduk ma uhurnami mansopotkon dousanami.
Sai pintori ham ganup hanai on.

7. Sai pamasuk Ham ganup hanai on;
Ulang modom be hanami bani pardousaon nami.
Sai puhoi Ham ganup hanai on.

8. Sai pamasuk ham ganup hanai on;
Bai na jumlah ajalnami anggo bois bohalnami.
Sai pamasuk Ham das hu surga in.

1. Hata ni Jahowa Sipadamei jolma, hagoluhan in
In malas ni uhur, na mangapoh uhur namarhoru in
Gogoh ni Naibatangkin, paluahkon na porsaya humbai ganup dousa

2. Ganup pinarsinta sanggah lang itompa tanoh on ope
‘Ge na tinujuan ni ganup galangan, jumpah do use
Uhur ni Bapa-Ni in ipasaud Jesus Kristus, jolma in itobus

3. Domma ipasirsir idopni uhur-Ni, ‘ge layak-Ni rup
Domma matei Kristus, domma dob itobus hita haganup
Sangap ma bai Naibata na porsaya bai Hata-Ni in pagoluhon-Ni

4. Hata hagoluhan do nuan iboan Parambilan in
Na lampot tangaron, in do iberehon bai uhurta in
Ipodahi hita on ihatahon bei do hita paubah uhurta

6. In nuan onjolan na totap manahan sadokahni in
In hajongjonganku, in pangajamanku hagoluhankin
Sai totap ma gogohkin mangirikkon bai hata-Ni lao pasaud rosuh-Ni

7. O Jesus tangihon na hupangindohon holong atei-Mu!
Bere Ham ma gogoh lao marayak surga das hu lambung-Mu
Ase hu Bamu au roh anggo rotap ma hosahku, sai lihar dalanku

1. On panorang hasonangan anggo Ham o Jesuskin.
na pahusor bai pingkiran idop ni uhur-Mu in.
Anggo Jesus pinindahan, pitah Jesus na surahon,
ari na jenges ma in na pasonangkon uhurhin.

2. Sai ibere Ham hu bangku Jesus, hinalayak-Mu;
Sai ringgas do ham manohu na sihol bai Hata-Mu.
Gok bah tubuh hagoluhan dapot do Bamu, o Tuhan.
Sai dapotan do bujur haganup na roh Bamu.

3. Halaniin, o Tuhannami, tohu Ham Kuria on.
Pasu-pasu ham hanami ‘se bosur bai podah-Mu.
Sai sonai hanami bei, ase sai marulih bei.

1. Bere ham ma hatorangan, hapentaran mangarusi Hata-Mu
ampa mata na mangidah pakon uhur na mambotoh dalan-Mu
Ase tongtong mandompakkon, bohi-Mu hanai mardalan
ase igomgomi tonduy-Mu hanami.

2. Sai ajari Ham hanami, na tongtong ibagas haotoon in.
Sai porsaya ma hanami, Ham tumang do hagoluhan nami in
Roh dokahni, roh dohorni, uhur-Mu bai uhurnami
Sai sadalan pakon Hata-Mu hanami

3. Sai martuah ganup hita, na mambahen Jesus arihanni in
Ambit sai tongtong ra hita, martenger ni uhur bai Tuhanta in
Ham, o Jesus, sai patoguh hanai na i parporangan
ase jumpah bai ujungni hamonangan

4. Sai tangihon Ham, O Tuhan, anggo roh martonggo hanai on Bamu
Pasu-pasu marlobihan, bereonkon-Mu bai naroh hu Bamu
Hasomani Ham hanami, ase hot bai parpadanan
Ase ondos hanai on bai hagoluhan.

1. Ari na marhasonangan in ma ari Minggu in
Ari in do parsaranan bai ganup parhorja in
Sai martuah halak in na ringgas marminggu in

2. Ai sonaha pakeianku marayakkon Naibata?
Unduk, toruh ni uhurhu, ai do hiou na tama.
Anggo domma dong sonin, boi ma au bai Tuhankin

3. Ham, o Tuhan sai pagoluh, sai ajari Ham au on;
Anggoa bumbang, sai patoguh janah apoh Ham au on
Hata-Mu patorang Ham, sai tongtong bai uhurhon

4. Pasaud Ham ma pangajaran na nidok ni Hata-Mu;
Ham patoguh parpadanan bai ganup na roh Bamu
Sai totap urupi Ham na martonggo dompak Ham

judul: Dob Salpu Taun na Buruk in
lirik:

Ai iparorot Ham tongtong tonduyhu pakon dagingkon

2. Holong ma Ham, o Jesus, patorap Ham gabei-Mu in
Bani Kuria-Mu tongtong ibagas taun na baru on
Bani Kuria-Mu tongtong ibagas taun na baru on

Tapi pangagou haganup, padaoh Ham ma in tongtong
Tapi pangagou haganup, padaoh Ham ma in tongtong

4. Sai sasap Ham ma dousangkin, dousangku taun na salpu in
Sai uras Ham ma in ganup, Tuhan holong ma atei-Mu
Sai uras Ham ma in ganup, Tuhan holong ma atei-Mu

5. Urupi, pargogohi Ham hanami mambalosi ham
Lao manundalhon dousa in, ampa ganup na jahat in
Lao manundalhon dousa in, ampa ganup na jahat in

6. Sai togu ham hanami on hu hagoluhan na tongtong
Totap bai Kuria-Mu, rupeini na tarsulur in
Totap bai Kuria-Mu, rupeini na tarsulur in

1. Puji hita Naibatanta, puji hita Anak-Niin,
Puji hita ge Tonduy-Ni Sitolu Sada do in
Haleluya, haleluya, Sitolu Sada do in

2. Puji hita Raja surga, Tuhan ni manisia
Puji hita Raja ‘Greja, bai ganup dunia on
Haleluya, haleluya, bai ganup dunia on

3. Haleluya isombahkon, na porsaya hu Bamu
Bai arian pakon borngin, idodingkon hu Bamu
Haleluya, haleluya, idodingkon hu Bamu.

1. Na pansing na pansing Tuhan parkuasa
Ari on hanami mamuji Naibata
Napansing napansing janah marjumbalang
Sitolu sada na sangap tumang

2. Na pansing na pansing hotak-Mu i surga
Halak na mapansing manrogop hu Bamu
Haganup malekat sai mamuji Tuhan
Raja na sangap sadokah ni in

3. Na pansing na pansing na seng boi tandaon
ni ganup pardousa na butak na golap
Gok hapansingon-Mu, Ham do parkuasa
Gok haholongon, Ham o Naibata

4. Na pansing na pansing Tuhan parkuasa
ningon do pujion ni na tinompa-Mu
Na pansing, na pansing janah marjumbalang
Sitolu sada na sangap tumang

1. Sada goran na majenges humbai ganup goran in
Goran ni Tuhanta Jesus in do sijengesan in
Goran-Mu o Tuhan sai dodingkononku in
Goran-Mu Jesuskin na pamalum uhurhin

2. Sai na malum do uhurhu, domma sonang tonduyhin
Goran-Mu, do sinajatangku, maralohon munsuhkin
Goran-Mu, O Tuhan sai dodingkononku in
Goran-Mu, Jesuskin na pamalum uhurkin

3. Sipaluah do Goran-Mu, na pamonang tonduyhin
Ganup rantei ni si bolis, ningon rotap baenon niin
Goran-Mu, O Tuhan sai dodingkononku in
Goran-Mu, Jesuskin na pamalum uhurkin

4. Sai dodingkon ma Goran-Ni, laho manaksihon in
Paima das hita hu surga, lao manombah Tuhan in
Goran-Mu, O Tuhan sai dodingkononku in
Goran-Mu, Jesuskin na pamalum uhurkin

1. Martumpu ganupan manombah Tuhan
Sai puji ma Ia parlayak do in
Maronti ma ganupan paruntolon
Igantih gabe damei na sonang

2. Hormati Goran-Ni janah pingkirhon,
Ganup halongangan na binaen-Ni in.
Diatei tupa ma hatahononta,
marbuah ma haporsayaonta.

3. Martonggo ma hita janah manjaga,
ase totap ma haporsayaonta.
I dunia dong sada hamonangan,
ai ma haporsaon bai Tuhan.

1. Huhamegahkon do in tongtong: Jesus Tuhanku rupeihu tongon;
Au parsimada tinobus-Nin napinabayu ni Tonduy in
Marmegah-megah mandoding au, mamuji Jesus parholong in
Marmegah-megah mandoding au, mamuji Jesus parholong in.

2. Ondos ganupan na dear in, pasu-pasu-Ni na manggoki au
Songon doding ni malekat in, holong mamitah rap pakon au
Marmegah-megah mandoding au, mamuji Jesus parholong in
Marmegah-megah mandoding au, mamuji Jesus parholong in.

3. Sai hu ondoskon ma diringkon, ibagas Tuhan sonang uhurhon
Mangalo-alo parroh-Ni in, gok bai holong-Ni do goluhkin
Marmegah-megah mandoding au, mamuji Jesus parholong in
Marmegah-megah mandoding au, mamuji Jesus parholong in.

1. Bani na martonggo ahu hu Bamu o Tuhankin.
Ajar Ham ma au manjalo ganup na binere-Mu.
Mangakuhon songon Jesus bani sitaranon-Niin.
Seng rosuhku pasaudonku pitah rosuhmu Tuhan.

2. Atap aha husurahon na dear bai goluhkon.
Bahen Ham au pambalosi bani ganup rosuh-Mu.
Mangauhon ‘pa porsaya ‘ge galek pe uhurhon.
Seng rosuhku pasaudonku pitah rosuhmu Tuhan.

3. Hupindahi apoh-apoh pitah bani holong-Mu
Sanggah na tarsosak ahu Ham ma na manogu au
Mangakuhon songon Jesus bani sitaronon-Nin
Seng rosuhku pasaudonku pitah rosuhmu Tuhan.

1. Jesus na manobus ahu sai tangihon au
Ulang lupa Ham hubangku tatap Ham ma au
Jesus, Jesus sai tangihon au
Ulang lupa Ham hubangku pasu-pasu au

2. Tuhan Jesus na gok holong, sai paluah au
Se toguh haporsayaon au ma rupei-Mu
Jesus, Jesus, sai tangihon au
Ulang lupa Ham hubangku pasu-pasu au

3. Ham do tong pangarapanku paluahkon au
Sai pasonang Ham uhurhu sai papansing au
Jesus, Jesus sai tangihon au
Ulang lupa Ham hubangku pasu-pasu au

4. Jesus, ham do onjolanku Sipagoluh au
Sedo arta hasonangan, Ham do Tuhankin
Jesus, Jesus, sai tangihon au
Ulang lupa Ham hubangku pasu-pasu au

1. Au sol dohor Bamu Ham Naibata
'Ge pe manaron au hu porsan ma
Mandoding do au on mamuji Ham tongtong
Lambin dohor Bamu dohor Bamu

2. Bai pardalanankin bod ari in
‘ge bai na golap in pos uhurhin
Sanggah mardalan au ulang tadingkon au
ase dohor Bamu, dohor Bamu

3. Tungkis pe dalan in bolusankin
Pitah tangan-Mu in manogu au
Nini suruhan-Mu ningon dohor Bamu
Ningon dohor Bamu, dohor Bamu

4. Bani na puho au hubotoh ma
i lambung-Mu do au Ham Naibata
Sai tong ma sonang au asal dohor Bamu
Asal dohor Bamu, dohor Bamu

1.Ge daoh ponop openi ujungni dalankin
Tuhan do manogu ahu bani pardalanankin
Bahen Ham au pambalosi bani ganup rosuh-Mu
Lang be sangsi janah gobir sai totap porsaya au

2. Tuhan ulang au paturut manontuhon langkahkin
Pitah Ham ma hutangihon bai ganupan goluh on
Bai ganup hahuranganku pakon pardousaonkin
Togu-togu Ham ma ahu das hubani ujungnin

3. Rapkon Bapa in do ahu, 'ge mamolus na golap
Pitah Ia hubalosi halani holong-Ni in
Ge pe lang huidah nuan gok ni malas uhur in
Pos uhurhu bani Tuhan jaloonku use in

judul: Rap Pakon Ahu Bod ma Ari in
lirik:
1.Rap pakon ahu bod ma ari in,
Golap pe ari, rap hita Tuhan
Lang dong na legan mangurupi au
pitah Tuhanku hasomanku tong

2. Surut pe umur, ajal pe dohor
Mantin pe goluh, salpu do ganup
Seng dong na tahan, lang dong na toguh
Ham ma totap rap pakon au tongtong

3. Ham pangajaman, bani goluhkon
Bai parlajouan, Ham hujolom tong
Seng jumpah ahu, songon Ham Tuhan
arian borngin rap au pakon Ham

4. Seng au mabiar, ai dohor Bamu
Parngit pe goluh, lang borat be in
‘Ge hamateian, lang marsorod be
Tuhanku na dob puho rapkon au

5. Baen Ham silang-Mu, tong i olobeihin
Ase mardalan, au bai na lihar
Sondang-Mu in padoh na golap in
Tuhan sai hot ma Ham rap pakon au

1. Boru Sion megah ho, megah ho Jerusalem

2. Hosiana Anak Daud, sai paluah bangsa-Mu

Hosianna Anak Daud, sai paluah bangsa-Mu

Padaoh Ham sinjata in bai ganupan bangsa-Mu
Hosiana Anak Daud, bere Ham ma damei-Mu

Paringoran subil pe, sai daoh ma in ganup
Hosiana Anak daud, bere na sonang totap

1. Humbai pulou ge banua sai tarbogei do torus

Gloria, puji ma Tuhanta, Gloria puji ma Tuhanta

gabe doskon jolma Tuhan parholong in, sangap, sangap

ai tibal do Ia bani palangka in, sangap, sangap

roh sidea manombah Tuhanta in

1. Sai puji ma Tuhanta in, ai tubuh Jesus in

lao patalarhon holong-Ni in

1. Hupuji hupasangap Ham, Bapa pardear layak.
Ganupan ijadihon Ham, sonai age na masa.
Itompa Ham ganup hape, dagingku pakon tonduy pe.
Napuji ma Goran-Mu.

2. Ganupan tinompa-Mu in, sol sonang bahenon-Mu.
Arian pakon borngin in, sai Ham do na marmudu.
‘Ge uhum bai gomgoman-Mu, pintor janah sintong ganup.
Na puji ma Goran-Mu.

3. Seng ongga tading bangsa-Mu, ganup na pinilih-Mu.
Ganup mangihut hu Bamu, pasaudkon rosuh-Mu.
Itogu Ham do haganup, ase hu hagoluhkon rup.
Na puji ma Goran-Mu.

4. Tongtong pasangaponku Ham, sadokah au manggoluh.
Paratah-ratahonku ma, barita ni Goran-Mu.
Angkula tonduy pe homa, ningon mamuji sangap-Mu.
Na puji ma Goran-Mu.

5. Antong roh bei ma hita le, ganupan na porsaya.
Marolob-olob hita bei, mamuji Naibatanta.
Dear tumang ganup hape, na binahen ni Naibata.
Na puji ma Goran-Ni.

1. Puji ma Naibatanta bai ianan Na PansingNi in, Bai paratas hamuliaonNi in
Haleluya, Haleluya Puji ma Naibata.
Pasangap ma goranNi halani pambahenanNi in, ampakon hagogohonNi in
Haleluya, Haleluya pasangap Naibata
Pahata ma tarompit ge arbab pe, irandu pakon gondrang husapi pe
Irik homa sarunei ge sordam pe, sonai ampakon ogung marolol bei
Puji ma rumbuk ma baen parhata ni parugas in
Sombah ma marhiteihonni doding na lurlur ijin

2. Puji ma Naibatanta Sipargogoh na tarsulur in, Parsimada harajaon in
Haleluya, Haleluya Puji ma Naibata
Pasangap ma goranNi, ale ganup na marhosah in, Ningon rup ma mamuji ijin
Haleluya, Haleluya Pasangap Naibata
Pahata ma tarompit ge arbab pe, irandu pakon gondrang husapi pe

Puji ma rumbuk ma baen parhata ni parugas in

1. Sai puji ma Tuhan tongon, na marmuduhon goluhta on.
Dodingkon ma goran-Ni tongtong na manobus hita pardousa on.
Amen, haleluya, sai puji Tuhan Naibatanta na sangap in.

2. Seng dong songon-Si i tanoh on, na mangurupi hita tongtong
Ihopkop do ganup hita on, seng adong na tading humbanta on
Amen, haleluya, sai puji Tuhan Naibatanta na sangap in.

3. Halani ai sai jalo ma in, panghopkop ni Tuhan Jesus in
Ulang parsoya-soya be in, haluahon nabinoban-Ni in
Amen, haleluya, sai puji Tuhan Naibatanta na sangap in.

1. Ganup ari do in, ronsi tahun hu tahun,
Sihol do hudodingkon Goran mu.
Ham Tuhan Naibata, sai hupuji do Ham,
halani haganup layak-Mu.
Ham arta naharga, poltik hujolom in,
humbani nahinan Ham do tong Naibatangkin.
Bonani na dear, ronsi sadokah nin.
Panondang na lihar, bai ganup nagolap in.

2. Hatamu do Tuhan, hupindahi nuan,
bahen suluh bai pardalankin.
Pitah Ham dansa in, na mambotoh ijin,
Aha na huporluhon Tuhan.
Ham arta naharga, poltik hujolom in,
humbani nahinan Ham do tong Naibatangkin.
Bonani na dear, ronsi sadokah nin.
Panondang na lihar, bai ganup nagolap in.

1. Haleluya! Sai puji Naibatanta na sangap in,
sitompa dunia on ampakon pangisini.
Haleluya! Marsombah hu lobei-Ni do ganup in,
anjaha maningon do tunduk bani kuasa-Ni.

2. Haleluya! Dodingkon ma Goran-Ni Tuhanta in,
marhitei gonrang ampakon ogung na marolol.
Haleluya! Olobkon ma tongtong pambaennan-Ni in,
na patorsahon ibanta ganup pargoluhon.

3. Haleluya! Bamu do hatunggungon tongtong Tuhan,
halani jengesni in ganupan tinompa-Mu.
Haleluya! Jimot janah torsa iramotkon Ham,
baen goluh nami ase totap marmalas uhur.

1. Hatahononta diatei tupa ma, ai Negaranta tanoh na lambut
Laut bolag dologni pe ratah, talun jenges ampar do haganup
In haganupan pasu-pasu-Ni, simada kuasa Tuhan Naibata
In haganupan pasu-pasu-Ni , simada kuasa Tuhan Naibata

2. Sanggah poltak mataniari in, martitialas bai sogodni in,
Morum mangerbang bunga-bunga in, irandu doding ni bossala in
In haganupan pasu-pasu-Ni, simada kuasa Tuhan Naibata
In haganupan pasu-pasu-Ni , simada kuasa Tuhan Naibata

3. Tanoh na gombur musim pe dear, torsa ganupan mambahen jagar
Jenges idahon damei do ijin, in ma tanohta hatubuhan in
In haganupan pasu-pasu-Ni, simada kuasa Tuhan Naibata
In haganupan pasu-pasu-Ni , simada kuasa Tuhan Naibata

1. Puji ma Jahowa Tuhan Naibata, ai marjumbalang do Goran-Ni in
Haganupan jolma sai marsombah ma, sai hagoluhkon hata-Ni in
Holsoh haganupan mambur, tubuh ma malasni uhur
Gok bai pangarapan holong na totap, rap mangolobkon Goran-Ni in

2. Ningon do marsombah bani Naibata, puji ma Ia pargogoh do in
Ulang marnaloja sai irikkon ma, rap mambalosi hata-Ni in
Holsoh haganupan mambur, tubuh ma malasni uhur
Gok bai pangarapan holong na totap, rap mandodingkon: Haleluya!

1. Haleluya puji ma Tuhan, pasangap marhiteihon gondrang na laingan
Irandu pakon inggou na lurlur homa tangaron
Dodingkon ma doding na baru, Puji ma Ia bai hotakNi na ibabou
Janah olobkon ma riap marmalas uhur.
Sai tarbarita baen goran-Ni, Gok halongangan ganup jadi-jadian-Ni
Puji Tuhan Haleluya!

2. Marmegah gok tarima kasih, Halani ganup pasu-pasu 'ge layak-Ni
Hubanta na totap sirsir tong mambalosi.
Tunggung tumang do tong Tuhanta, Ia do Raja ni ganup sagala raja
Ningon hu Bani do unduk ganup marsombah
Sai tarbarita baen goran-Ni , gok halongangan ganup jadi-jadian-Ni
Puji Tuhan Haleluya

1. Naibata mangkasomani ham, ronsi boi hita pajumpah
Kristus ma mambere tuah, Naibata mangkasomani ham
Sai horas ma ham, sai horas, ronsi na pajumpah sai horas
Sai horas ma ham, sai horas, Naibata mangkasomani ham

2. Naibata mangkasomani ham, kuasa-Nin parlinggomanmu.
Hata-Nin hagoluhanmu, Naibata mangkasomani ham.
Sai horas ma ham, sai horas, ronsi na pajumpah sai horas
Sai horas ma ham, sai horas, Naibata mangkasomani ham.

3. Naibata mangkasomani ham, bai ganup halojaonmu.
Tong do ham sai i parmudu, Naibata mangkasomani ham.
Sai horas ma ham, sai horas, ronsi na pajumpah sai horas
Sai horas ma ham, sai horas, Naibata mangkasomani ham.

4. Naibata mangkasomani ham, padan-Nin poltik ma jolom.
Sai martonggo ulang holang, Naibata mangkasomani ham.
Sai horas ma ham, sai horas, ronsi na pajumpah sai horas
Sai horas ma ham, sai horas, Naibata mangkasomani ham.

1. O Tuhan tangihon hanai on, balosi pangindouan nami
Sai paluah Ham hanami on, humbani dousani dunia on

2. Jalo ma pamujinami on, halani Ham gok holong do tongtong.
Sai patoguh uhurnami on, lao mandompakhon dalan na mahol.

3. Pasu-pasu hanai on ganup, na ra pongkut ibagas horja-Mu.
In ma na mangarap hu Bamu, parholong janah porsaya Bamu.

judul: Diatei Tupa ma Bamu Ham Naibata
lirik:
1. Diatei tupa ma bamu Ham Naibata, mambaen tupa humpulannami on
Igomgom Ham do horja nami on torsa, gok malas uhur do hanai ijon
Ibere Ham do damei na tarsulur, sanggah manranggi horja haganup
Nuan hanami rap marmalas uhur, mardingat haganup pambaenan-Mu

2. Ipardimata Ham do tong hanai on Tuhan, ai sorap do Tonduy-Mu in tongtong
Ase torsa mardalan horja ganupan, Kuasa-Mu do in mambaen sintong
Porini dong rundut ni paruhuran, sirsir do Ham manohu hanai on
Ai hata-Mu do tong na pagolpahon, mambaen tapang nuan ganup ijon

1. Marodor na porsaya ganupan,
na laho misir huparmingguan, damei tongtong,
Tunggung jagiah doi idahon,
minar bohini ganupan, damei do tongtong.

2. Talup janah pantun marpahean,
songon na laho hu parpestaan, damei do tongtong.
Rosuh tumang uhur maniru,
halani dear ni parlahou, damei do tongtong.

3. Porini pe adong lobih hurang,
pongkut do manangihon ambilan, damei do tongtong.
Tanda do ganup na dob monang,
tinobus ni Jesus parholong, damei do tongtong.

1. On ma hape panorang, in ma panorang parjumpahan
Na laho manangar ambilan, lao pasonangkon paruhuran, ibanta on

2. Dear ma naundukkon, haganupan hata ni Tuhan,
in ma na baen gabe onjolan, laho partorsahon pargoluhon, in banta on.

3. Bani horja ni Tuhan, sai ringgas bei hita ganupan
ase totap malas uhurta, janah baru paruhuranta, bai goluh on.

4. Totap marhasadaon, janah totap marpangarapan,
in do harosuh ni Tuhanta, na laho sihorjahononta, bai goluh on.

5. Gok damei paruhuran, ampakon marsihaholongan,
janah basar dompak hasoman, in ma buah haporsayaon, bai goluh on.

1. Eta nasiam! Eta nasiam!
Misir hita hu gareja laho marminggu
Sihol manangar ambilan hatani Tuhan. Eta nasiam!

2. Roh ma nasiam! Roh ma nasiam!
Halilian mambahen kahou ulang tangihon.
Dearan ma na marminggu sai na porluhon, roh ma nasiam!

3. Tangihon ma! Tangihon ma!
Hagolapan na dob salpu ulang be mulgap.
Jalo ma Tuhanta Jesus gabe panotap, tangihon ma!

4. Akuhon ma! Akuhon ma!
Sai sopotkon ganup dousa ‘ge panlanggaron.
Ase dihut parsimada bai hasonangan, akuhon ma!

5. Jolom poltik! Jolom poltik!
Dilo-dilo ni Tuhanta ulang lanseihon.
Ulang ganggang hun tanganta be haluahon, jolom poltik!

1. Masihol anjaha ayak do tumang uhurhu,
Pajumpah ampakon Ham Tuhan Naibatangku bani rumah-Mu on.
Ai mambur do haganup pusok ni uhur
Marhitei isasap Ham haganup dousangku, bani rumah-Mu on

2. Marmegah marolob-olob ijon uhurhu,
bosuran manjalo tadah bani tonduyhu, in ma ambilan-Mu.
Ungkap do hubahen uhurhu lao mangakuhon,
tahar do hubaen pinggolhu lao manangihon, in ma ambilan-Mu.

3. Lurlur do hubaen sorakku lao mandodingkon,
gombas do hubaen gogohku lao pararatkon, ganup ambilan-Mu.
Naheihu pe huparinggas do manlakkahkon,
dilahku pe hupatalup do manaksihon, ganup ambilan-Mu.

1. Humpul nuan hanami Tuhan, i rumah-Mu sonari
Manjalo hata-Mu o Tuhan, ase dong bohal nami.

2. Buhai ma uhurnami Tuhan, manangihon ambilan.
Ai in do gogohnami nuan, pamalas paruhuran.

3. Ai pitah hata-Mu do nuan, na boi baen sijoloman.
Na gabe tukkotnami Tuhan, bai ganup sidalanan.

4. Ondos Bamu hanami Tuhan, sai Ham ma na marorot.
Ase ulang mandolei Tuhan, anggo roh songgot-songgot.

1. Marhata giring-giring bapa, mandilo roh marminggu.
Sai ulang hita tading bapa, bai ontangan ni Jesus
Ai in do arta sijengesan, na gok malas ni uhur
Naima tongon eta mada tapang hita marminggu

2. Dear ma ham marhobas Inang ase borhat sonari
Ria pakon niombah inang on mada panorangni
Odor lao hu Gareja inang tapang hita sonari
Naima tongon eta mada tapang hita marminggu

3. Sai ulang homa lupa tong-tong arahkon ma hasoman
Ai do tandani hita tongon na dob gabe susian
Ra mandalankon holong sintong songon tonahni Tuhan
Naima tongon eta mada tapang hita marminggu

4. Sirsir ma hita on haganup, tangihon ma ambilan.
Manjalo malas uhurta rup, pasu-pasu ni Tuhan.
Manopa paruhuran talup, lao mangirikhon Tuhan.
Naima tongon! Eta ma da! Tapang hita marminggu.

1. Panorang na dear tama, hita martumpu.
Mamudji Tuhan Naibata, bai ari Minggu
Eta ma misir hita rup, lao hu gareja.
Mamuji Naibata unduk, odor ma hita.
Horas horas hita ganup, ulang mahua
Daoh ma in na lang talup, i baen Tuhanta.

2. Sadari on ma da tongon, ari ni Tuhan.
Ulang das lolei hita on, hupartumpuan.
Eta ma misir hita rup, lao hu gareja.
Mamuji Naibata unduk, odor ma hita.
Horas horas hita ganup, ulang mahua
Daoh ma in na lang talup, i baen Tuhanta.

3. Ari na madear tumang, bai na mar Tuhan.
Langkah ni pe tongtong torang, hu parmingguan.
Eta ma misir hita rup, lao hu gareja.
Mamuji Naibata unduk, odor ma hita.
Horas horas hita ganup, ulang mahua
Daoh ma in na lang talup, i baen Tuhanta.

4. Marsiarahan hita on, pakon hasoman.
Ase jumpahan hita tong, layak ni Tuhan.
Eta ma misir hita rup, lao hu gareja.
Mamuji Naibata unduk, odor ma hita.
Horas horas hita ganup, ulang mahua
Daoh ma in na lang talup, i baen Tuhanta.

1. Domma roh Jesus na pamalas uhur, Alpa, Omega Tuhanta na totap
Naibata na sintong hun surga susur, na ra marsaor doskon jolma rap
Surga pakon dunia baen ma mungmung, domma roh Jesus na pamalas uhur

2. Domma roh Jesus manrotapkon tali, kuasa ni dousa salpu ma ijin.
Ai haluahon roh gantih ni gari, humbai gomgoman ni na golap in.
Pusok ni uhur, holsoh pe maronti, domma roh Jesus manrotapkon tali.

3. Domma roh Jesus simada kuasa, iruntas do ganup hurungan in.
Sorod ni dousa domma iparseda, dalan maluah tarbuka ijin.
Magou ma ho bolis taronkon mara, domma roh Jesus simada kuasa.

4. Domma roh Jesus pambobai na sangap, ganup tinompa rap mamuji ma.
Ai pitah Ia hansa haluahon, ungkab uhurmu jalo ma torsa.
Sortalimin pe domma isarihon, domma roh Jesus pambobai na sangap.

1. Bai borngin ni in sanggah tubuh Jesus ijin.
sinok do par Betlehem in, seng dong na mambotoh,
Talar ma ijin Anak bagah-bagah do in,
Na dob ibagahkon hinan, laho manobus jolma
Saud ma tongon ganup na tarsurat in,
na sinuratni ganup Nabi.
Jalo ma in hagoluhanmu do in,
ase das ham hu hasonangan.

2. Megah do tumang hai uhurni si Josep in,
ampa si Maria ijin na mangabing Jesus.
Ijin ma torang Anak na hun surga do in,
sinuruh ni Bapa do in, pardousa itobus.
Saud ma tongon ganup na tarsurat in,
na sinuratni ganup Nabi.
Jalo ma in hagoluhanmu do in,
ase das ham hu hasonangan.

3. Ganup hita on ase hamegahkon ma in,
puji ma goran-Ni tongtong ronsi sadokahni.
Ai seng dong ijon na marhagogohon sonin,
boi manogu jolma tongon gabe hulanan-Ni.
Saud ma tongon ganup na tarsurat in,
na sinuratni ganup Nabi.
Jalo ma in hagoluhanmu do in,
ase das ham hu hasonangan.

1. Girah sogod golap ijin, misir do lao parmahan in.
Mangidah Kristus, songon tonah ni malekat in.
Ididah do ijin, ididah do ijin, ididah na dob tubuh Sipaluah

2. Seng pala sangsi hita on, na marianan i na daoh.
‘Ge bangsa na i tanoh on, bogei ma hata on.
Sai eta ma tongon, sai eta ma tongon.
Ai domma tubuh Kristus banta borngin on.

3. Ulang sai soh hita ganup, eta ma misir hita rup.
Malekat padosdoskon in, bai dalan turun naik.
Marsurak ma ganup, marsurak ma ganup.
Patugah na dob tubuh Sipaluah in.

1. Tongah borngin sanggah bintang torang,
irandu logou marombus.
Sinok do parmahan i Efrata,
dob loja mansari goluh.
Na so panagaman tarbogei ma ijin,
sorani malekat patugahkon ijin!
Domma tubuh Sipaluah, in ma Kristus Tuhan”.

2. Gok habiar do parmahan tokkin,
dob inggot ijin sinalsal.
Tapi roh nini malekat ijin,
“Ulang hanima mabiar!
Ai ambilan malas uhur banggal do on,
na hu boban bannima ijon borngin on.
Domma tubuh Sipaluah, in ma Kristus Tuhan”.

3. Misir ma ganup parmahan ale,
songon tonah ni malekat.
Dob pajumpah mintor manrogop bei,
marsombah bani Tuhanta.
Sangap ma bai Naibata ibabou tongtong,
Damei ma bai ganup jolma i tanoh on.
Domma tubuh Sipaluah, in ma Kristus Tuhan.
